camel.sink.endpoint.newRemotePath.name: camel.sink.endpoint.newRemotePath
camel.sink.endpoint.newRemotePath.description: New path on Atmos when moving files

camel.sink.endpoint.remotePath.name: camel.sink.endpoint.remotePath
camel.sink.endpoint.remotePath.description: Where to put files on Atmos

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.name: camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding
camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.description: Whether the endpoint should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous
camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.sink.endpoint.secretKey.name: camel.sink.endpoint.secretKey
camel.sink.endpoint.secretKey.description: The secret key to pass to the Atmos client (should be base64 encoded)

camel.component.atmos.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.component.atmos.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.atmos.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.atmos.basicPropertyBindi.name: camel.component.atmos.basicPropertyBinding
camel.component.atmos.basicPropertyBindi.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.component.atmos.uri.name: camel.component.atmos.uri
camel.component.atmos.uri.description: The URI of the server for the Atmos client to connect to

camel.component.atmos.fullTokenId.name: camel.component.atmos.fullTokenId
camel.component.atmos.fullTokenId.description: The token id to pass to the Atmos client

camel.component.atmos.secretKey.name: camel.component.atmos.secretKey
camel.component.atmos.secretKey.description: The secret key to pass to the Atmos client (should be base64 encoded)

camel.component.atmos.sslValidation.name: camel.component.atmos.sslValidation
camel.component.atmos.sslValidation.description: Whether the Atmos client should perform SSL validation
